BeHealth Solutions | Senior Rails Developer | US | Remote

Hi, I'm Alan Lattimore, lead developer at BeHealth Solutions. We are seeking an experienced software engineer to join a small team developing high-volume Software as a Service web applications in the field of digital health using all of the latest technologies.

What You'll Do: * Build maintainable, scalable web applications with rich dynamic interfaces.

* Work with a solid team of experienced peers.

* Participate in the mentoring of junior developers, contribute your expertise to technology choices, and collaborate on architecture and design.

* Add features, fix code and deploy from day one.

Our stack is: Rails 5; Ruby 2.2; MySQL 5.7; Bootstrap 3 and Sass; vanilla JavaScript, jQuery and CoffeeScript; AJAX and JSON; Sidekiq; Redis; RSpec 3; Capistrano 2; git and GitHub; JIRA; Slack

Full job description here: http://www.behealthsolutions.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/...

You can reach out to me at alan.lattimore at behealthsolutions dot com.
